item.title: Report X-2025011285
item.description:
Report X-2025011285

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-04T06:26:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-20
  • City: GREENSBORO
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: CALL WAS MADE TO THE DMP CAGE ABOUT A POSSIBLE LEAKING HAZMAT. DESIGNATED RESPONDER FOUND PACKAGE ON THE FLOOR WITH THE BOTTOM WET. RESPONDER OPENED PACKAGE TO FIND CAP OFF OF CONTAINER BUT STILL IN THE BOX. FOLLOWING ALL PROPER RESPONDER METHODS, PACKAGE WAS SECURED AND TERURNED TO THE DMP CAGE TO BE PROCESSED.
